20101221161133.000|20101221161136.000|TR0|Child Lover's Code of Conduct."

20101221163421.000|20101221163424.000|TR0|hour on the U.S. Census. According to the 
20101221163424.000|20101221163426.000|TR0|numbers just released, the population of 
20101221163426.000|20101221163429.000|TR0|the United States grew 9.7 percent from 
20101221163429.000|20101221163432.000|TR0|2000 to 2010, that is the slowest rate 
20101221163432.000|20101221163434.000|TR0|since the 1930s.  The current number of 
20101221163434.000|20101221163437.000|TR0|people in the United States is 308,748,538.
20101221163437.000|20101221163439.000|TR0|
20101221163439.000|20101221163442.000|TR0|The figures determine the number of 
20101221163442.000|20101221163445.000|TR0|Congressional seats allotted to each state

20101221163503.000|20101221163506.000|TR0|
20101221163506.000|20101221163508.000|TR0|Lessons of a breast cancer diagnosis.  A 
20101221163508.000|20101221163511.000|TR0|survivor's own homework makes her an 
20101221163511.000|20101221163513.000|TR0|empowered patient.
20101221163513.000|20101221163516.000|TR0|

20101221163519.000|20101221163521.000|TR0|
20101221163521.000|20101221163524.000|TR0|HARRIS:  You know, when it comes to your 
20101221163524.000|20101221163526.000|TR0|medical care, experts say do your 
20101221163526.000|20101221163529.000|TR0|homework.  Sometimes an empowered patient

20101221163558.000|20101221163600.000|TR0|come back.  And what scares her even more

20101221164640.000|20101221164643.000|TR0|very well from the chemo, so she had a lot

20101221165854.000|20101221165856.000|TR0|with say their grades went up last year

20101221165859.000|20101221165901.000|TR0|superintendent says for the cost of a 
20101221165901.000|20101221165904.000|TR0|single computer locked away in a lab, she 
20101221165904.000|20101221165907.000|TR0|could hand out mobile devices to an entire 
20101221165907.000|20101221165909.000|TR0|class so kids of all income levels would 
20101221165909.000|20101221165912.000|TR0|have access to the latest technology and
